meanings.definition: A member of the clergy who performs religious rites
meanings.sent1: The sacerdotalists led the church service with reverence.
meanings.sent2: The sacerdotalists gathered to bless the newborn babies.
meanings.sent3: The sacerdotalists joked about who could perform the longest ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The presence of the sacerdotalists in the temple filled the air with solemnity.
meanings.sent5: The community respected the sacerdotalists for their spiritual guidance.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of sacerdotalists
meanings.sent1: The room was decorated with sacerdotalists symbols.
meanings.sent2: Her attire had a sacerdotalists touch, reflecting her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The sacerdotalists-themed party was a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the essence of sacerdotalists aesthetics.
meanings.sent5: The architecture of the cathedral was undeniably sacerdotalists in design.
